alert.note: Alert for Benton; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 10:42PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Buchanan, northern Benton and northwestern Linn Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1041 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mount Auburn, or near Vinton, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Urbana around 1055 PM CDT. Walker around 1100 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Center Point and Troy Mills. This includes Interstate 380 between mile markers 33 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northeastern and east central Iowa.
